body.p: When asked for your password on a website, what do you check to determine whether the website is a phishing site?

multiple_choice.choice: Check that the icons and colors of the page look right.
Check that the logo and images are right.
Check that the date of the page is current.
Check that the URL at the top of the browser is correct.

response.feedback: Someone can easily copy the colors from the real website.
Someone can easily copy the logo and images from the real site.
The date can be correct on the phishing site too.
Check that the URL is, for example, www.ebay.com, not a phishing domain such as log.in.now.ebay.baddyguy.ru.
